entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 a.m. EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -5.3Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:12 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:12 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Near blizzard developing overnight. Blowing snow at times in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:12 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
